channel.title: Flash Server Status checker(now with a live example!)
channel.description:
This is on a PING disabled site, but tested on my pc with WAMP works perfectly, I will not release the source as it was really hard to start without knowledge, not use tutorials, and minimally use the flash help book, and kinda worth being payed for. here it is [url=http://www.kloplop321.com/status/loginserver.html]http://www.kloplop321.com/status/loginserver.html[/url] it will seem weird for two reasons, one, You cannot add servers, as my server can't ping to tell if they are on, as soon as I can contact my friend, I can get him to host it on a ping server(his PC) and It updates similar to mopar's does not register % yet, but does register more information than you know at first, it uses exploded microtime to know when to update the server. The two "servers" are just tests of inserted data via phpMyAdmin. When It goes on a ping-able server, I will post, and Edit in the new link. This uses MySQL for all the data. has a login thing in the case you only want people that login to be able to view it. This may not seem so special at first, but when you load it, it has a smooth table fade-in. the text, though dynamic, cannot go thru this effect, but the table can. the php that will be on this server will give you a 66% chance of seeing the fade in, as I will modify with a rand(); event that will make it show the Max, which is currently 39. Can be edited, but I don't care to right now.
OK I finally got my web server to work publicly (on my computer) so i finally have a live version of this that works! I used a port redirect thingy for this, so there will be 1 poppup.(using a free dynamic hosting service for name) [url=http://kloplop321.doesntexist.org/]http://kloplop321.doesntexist.org/[/url] Try adding some and stuff, I need to perfect the flash but it works great though! this is on port 1992(I decided that)

item.title: Flash Server Status checker(now with a live example!)
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

Dynamic text doesn’t fade too well, I am trying a way to get past that. It is fast at times because it checks only-so-often, so stop lag. When it is slow, it means it is doing a checking loop and it has to ping every single server and check if they work-or-not. If you can figure a way to make dynamic text fade in flash, I would appreciate it.

Read full topic
item.source: Flash Server Status checker(now with a live example!)

item.title: Flash Server Status checker(now with a live example!)
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

yeah a few bugs, but first for the flash. “ONLINE” is directly after it was added, “Online” is a re-check. It takes a while because this is my computer, It doesn’t have like 40 pentium D’s in it(in total 80 pentium 4’s) And, why the heck did you make it ping my router :rolleyes:

Read full topic

hey it works now

few bugs

when u hit refresh it takes FOREVER to load the servers
when the servers load they show up then the fade comes in[br][size=1]Posted on: April 23, 2007, 07:18:57 AM[/size][hr]also why are some Online while others are ONLINE

item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

of course I do, but you need to let me have time to make an install.php[br][size=1]Posted on: April 09, 2007, 07:10:55 PM[/size][hr]OK I finally got my web server to work publicly (on my computer) so i finally have a live version of this that works! I used a port redirect thingy for this, so there will be 1 poppup.(using a free dynamic hosting service for name) http://kloplop321.doesntexist.org/ Try adding some and stuff, I need to perfect the flash but it works great though! this is on port 1992(I decided that) Thanks to Bang Train I got it to work, even though his suggestion wasn’t toward me.[br][size=1]Posted on: April 21, 2007, 09:16:55 PM[/size][hr]I converted to a static IP on my router so it should work now, my computer is 24/7 98.9% of the time.

Read full topic

[To Parent Directory]

       Friday, April 06, 2007 10:15 PM          400 config.inc.php
       Friday, April 06, 2007 10:09 PM         1382 login.php
       Friday, April 06, 2007 10:09 PM         1000 loginserver.html
       Friday, April 06, 2007 10:15 PM        47798 loginserver.swf
     Saturday, April 07, 2007  5:04 PM          490 ping.php
       Friday, April 06, 2007 10:09 PM         1426 register.php
       Friday, April 06, 2007 10:09 PM         1512 registerme.php
       Friday, April 06, 2007 10:17 PM        58306 server_status.swf
       Friday, April 06, 2007 10:29 PM         3289 status.php

uses php =] and forgot an index

item.title: Flash Server Status checker(now with a live example!)
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

you might need to update your flash player. the background is just white. It may still be loading.

Well, the fancy part is just the fade-in stuff, but since it takes place in mass for the “just show it” part of it, it may be slightly slow as 39 different movie clips are running, checking variables, at 40 FPS, so yeah.

Read full topic
